title: Adaptive Microlearning Course for the C Programming Language

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive training program for corporate managers/leaders conducted in smartphone-based resource-constrained technical environments

learning_goals: Learners can utilize core C language syntax (memory management, pointers, structures) with practical examples at 80% accuracy according to adaptive instructional methods.
Learners reduce cognitive load and automate the algorithm design process through dual-mode task examples, achieving 90% performance proficiency.
Learners complete 15-minute microlearning modules in a mobile environment and improve problem-solving skills by 70%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
